medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient 1 was diagnosed with polycythemia at age 16 and treated with sequential phlebotomies. Patient 2 has suffered from polycythemia since infancy and has been treated by phlebotomy. For both patients, there were no specific aggravating or relieving factors mentioned.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Both patients have a history of tumors: Patient 1 underwent surgery for pheochromocytoma at 45 years and for abdominal paragangliomas at 59 years, and was also diagnosed with somatostatinoma. Patient 2 underwent surgery for a nonfunctional adrenal paraganglioma at age 9.
medical_history.family_history: Patient 1's daughter and her children all had normal hematocrit values. Patient 2's family history was not specified.
